title: Professor Erikson. Part 1
creator_credit: James L. Brown and KUHT Film Productions
brief_description: An investigation of some theories of psychoanalysis, and personality growth. The film takes the form of an interview between Dr Erik Erikson, of Harvard University, a pioneer in the field of child analysis and research and Dr Richard Evans, of the University of Houston. They discuss Erikson’s theory of the eight stages of psycho development. Part 1 and 2 produced under a grant awarded by the national Science Foundation, USA.
